column2: "Oh, you're here! I've been waitin' fer ya."
"This Whatever-it's-called Facility just appeared outta nowhere! I dunno 'bout this place, but everyone's been gettin' bad vibes from it."
"That's why I decided to help out with yer investigation. To find out about the secrets an' stuff this place has, ya'know?"
"Yer greetin's still harsh as ever, missy. An' who's this mister?"
"You're Cabracan aren't you? I'm Zeno. Nice to meet you."
"I've heard about you from Echo. It's tough working with her isn't it? "
"So you've been through a lot of trouble with her too, ain't ya?"
"Aah, I've been carrying her for over ten years."
"Hah! To think that you've been partnerin' for that long!"
"Well, call us inseparable, but I can't just leave her alone..."
"I kinda get how ya feel. Ahahaha..."
"Th-that's right, yer here to investigate, aren't ya?"
"Then I'll be yer guide! This way, follow me!"
"Aren't you reliable, Cabracan! Well let's go!"
"Aah, h-hold on, you guys! Don't leave me behind!"
